title: John Carmack’s ‘Different Path’ to Artificial General Intelligence
dot:
digraph JohnCarmack_AGI{graph[rankdir=LR, fontname="Arial", fontsize=10];node[shape=box, style=rounded, fontname="Arial", fontsize=10];edge[fontname="Arial", fontsize=9];Carmack[label="John Carmack
Tech Innovator", style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue];Games[label="Pioneering Video Games
(id Software, 1991)", style=filled, fillcolor=lightgrey];Rockets[label="Suborbital Space Rockets
(Armadillo Aerospace, 2000-2013)", style=filled, fillcolor=lightgrey];VR[label="Virtual Reality
(Oculus, acquired by Meta, 2014)", style=filled, fillcolor=lightgrey];AGI[label="Artificial General Intelligence
(Keen Technologies, 2022-Present)", style=filled, fillcolor=lightgreen];AGI_Concept[label="Solving Artificial General Intelligence
(AGI: Machines that think, learn, and perform like humans)", style=dashed, fillcolor=white];AGI_Path[label="Path: Explore fundamental concepts and
merge multidisciplinary approaches", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor=lightyellow];AGI_Outcome[label="Outcome: Human-level intelligence in machines", style=filled, fillcolor=lightyellow];Challenges[label="Challenges:
- Lack of clear path
- Avoiding short-term distractions
- Balancing funding and experimentation", style=filled, fillcolor=mistyrose];Independent[label="Independent Research
Avoiding groupthink", style=filled, fillcolor=palegreen];Funding[label="Raised $20M (2022)
Long-term focus", style=filled, fillcolor=palegreen];Experiments[label="Building experiments and
exploring under-researched areas", style=filled, fillcolor=palegreen];Predictions[label="Predictions:
- 50-60% chance of AGI by 2030
- 95% chance by 2050", style=filled, fillcolor=lightgoldenrod];Carmack->Games;Carmack->Rockets;Carmack->VR;Carmack->AGI;AGI->AGI_Concept;AGI->AGI_Path;AGI->AGI_Outcome;AGI->Challenges;Challenges->Independent;Challenges->Funding;Challenges->Experiments;AGI->Predictions[style=dotted];}
